parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post information.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions "Constantin Fierăscu", identifying him as a USR candidate for the Chamber of Deputies in Teleorman. This directly refers to a parliamentary candidate, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True.  The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, aiming to reach a wide audience beyond personal communication. The reach estimate (100K - 500K) further supports this.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The primary objective of the post is to promote Constantin Fierăscu's candidacy. The image and text ("Teleorman in Parliament!") directly aim to influence voters to support him in the parliamentary elections. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post lacks the characteristics of journalistic reporting. It's not presenting objective news, analysis, or opinions; instead, it's promotional material for a specific candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear endorsement of a candidate for the parliamentary elections.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1923042014830768</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, identified by ad_archive_id "1923042014830768", is a paid advertisement promoting Constantin Fierăscu, a USR candidate for the Chamber of Deputies in Teleorman.  The post uses an image and text explicitly designed to encourage voters to support his candidacy.  The post's reach estimate (100K-500K) indicates a broad dissemination intended to influence the election outcome.  While the post doesn't contain a CMF number, this is not a requirement for determining if it's electoral propaganda. The post clearly fulfills the criteria of Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, specifically points a, c, and d.  The post's purpose is unequivocally electoral, aiming to increase votes for a specific candidate.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>Constantin Fierăscu</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Total Impact</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Total Impact, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 1923042014830768), după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatura lui Constantin Fierăscu pentru Camera Deputaților din partea USR în Teleorman. Reclama, cu o estimare a audienței de 100.000 - 500.000 de persoane, utilizează imagini și text ("Teleorman în Parlament!") menite să influențeze votul în favoarea candidatului, constituind astfel propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.  Textul reclamei menționează explicit numele candidatului și afilierea sa politică, îndeplinind criteriile articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  Efectul electoral este clar, având ca obiectiv creșterea numărului de voturi pentru Constantin Fierăscu.  Datele de contact ale Total Impact sunt disponibile în arhiva reclamei: contact@totalimpact.ro și +40748955922. Suma cheltuită este sub 100 RON.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
